https://gamebanana.com/textures/5156
The Lost & Found - Dystopian Desert Skybox
A Texture Mod for Counter-Strike 1.6

Lost & Found oldies series
Recovered from FilePlanet. These textures really remind me of Mad Max, as well as the anime Fist Of The North Star. Enjoy.

+ combined with doomsday skybox (with Gimp, doomsday layer a bit transparent)
